pkgmetadata.longdescription: The 2019 Novel Coronavirus COVID-19 (2019-nCoV) Italy Dataset // Provides a daily summary of the Coronavirus (COVID-19) cases in Italy by country, region and province level. Data source: Presidenza del Consiglio dei Ministri - Dipartimento della Protezione Civile https://www.protezionecivile.it/.
